## Events.CommentResize class

Notifies listeners that a workspace comment has resized.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CommentResize extends CommentBase 
```
**Extends:** [CommentBase](./blockly.events.commentbase.md)

|  [oldSize?](./blockly.events.commentresize.oldsize.md) |  | [Size](./blockly.utils.size.md) | _(Optional)_ The size of the comment before the resize. |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
